name: levelwater
description:
*NOTE: There may be an issue if you have screen scaling on: There are supposed to be buttons in the bottom of the screen!*

An Alakajam #8 submission. The theme was 'Depth'.

Keep the water level to earn funds (the more level, the more funds are gained), to keep the water level. Whatch out for toxic goop! It'll drain your funds (starting from 4). Luckily you can clean that stuff.

-- buttons --

What do they all do?

  • * '^^^': Hide audio controls.
    * Drain: The water will rise, then you'll have to drain. A little or a lot? Well, it'll cost you!
    * Pump: Not planning to swim? You better pump. A bit or a barrel? You'll have to pay.
    * Clean: Toxic goop galore. The funds'll run out this way! A bit of cleaning doesn't hurt... except in your wallet. But better now than later!
    * '||': Pauses the game, but not the audio.

-- camera --

As an extra treat, you can move the camera anywhere you want (non-euclidean space exempt from this offer).

* w,s,a,d: Controls as normal (sort of). If shift is pressed, controls the pitch/yaw instead.
* r,f: Up/down. If shift is enabled, it rolls just like in the game over screen.
